SELECT mean("cached") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") - mean("free") - mean("buffered") - mean("cached") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("free") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT mean("total") - mean("free") FROM "swap" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("cached") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.description: This requires the '[[inputs.kernel_vmstat]]' plugin be uncommented in the Telegraf configuration

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("pswpin"), 1s)*4096 FROM "kernel_vmstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("pswpout"), 1s)*4096 FROM "kernel_vmstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Swap Activity

panels.description: This requires the '[[inputs.kernel_vmstat]]' plugin be uncommented in the Telegraf configuration

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("pgpgin"), 1s) * 1024 FROM "kernel_vmstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("pgpgout"), 1s) * 1024 FROM "kernel_vmstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
